arukgoda kawi prabandhaya – piyasena rathuwithanagitha - ma aawa - ti. em. jayarathna kawurunda katada hangi – ti. em. jayarathna, malini bulathsinhala aadara pathum – ti. em. jayarathna githa patigatha kirima – lanka chithragarayanalu niliyan - sanath gunathilaka (sumedha), shriyani amarasena (sumali), soniya disanayaka (sistar meri), somi rathnayaka (hamu), reks kodippili (nithignya), wijaya nandasiri (siripala), jenita samarawira (mali), rathmali gunasekara (rathna), wijerathna warakagoda (nadukarathuma), rubi da mel (madar supiriyar), miyuri samarasinha (palliye sewikawa), winsant was (wathu himiya), mak samaranayaka (bishop thuma) fe්radi silwa (mithraya), denawaka hamine (sumedhage mawa), bi. dab. piyadasa, chandrasoma perera, sunilsoma piris, di.
